putContact.description: Updates a contact identified by id. Send the fields to update in the request body and receive the updated contact. Path parameters: id.

deleteContact.description: Deletes a contact identified by id. Use this endpoint to remove the contact and receive a confirmation response. Path parameters: id.

postContacts.description: Creates a contact. Send the contact payload in the request body and receive the created contact in the response.

putDeal.description: Updates a deal identified by id. Send the fields to update in the request body and receive the updated deal. Path parameters: id.

postDeals.description: Creates a deal. Send the deal payload in the request body and receive the created deal in the response.

postGenerate.description: Creates a generate. Send the generate payload in the request body and receive the created generate in the response.

postGenerate2.description: Creates a generate. Send the generate payload in the request body and receive the created generate in the response.

getContact.description: Reads a single contact identified by id. Use this query to fetch contact data without side effects. Path parameters: id.

getContacts.description: Reads contacts for display or reporting. Use this query to fetch contacts with optional filters or pagination.

getDeal.description: Reads a single deal identified by id. Use this query to fetch deal data without side effects. Path parameters: id.

getDeals.description: Reads deals for display or reporting. Use this query to fetch deals with optional filters or pagination.

getJob.description: Reads a single job identified by jobId. Use this query to fetch job data without side effects. Path parameters: jobId.
